title: Client says I 'left a game in progress' when the game ended 10 minutes ago?
body: I just finished a game in draft mode and after we won it said to 'wait for stats' or 'skip waiting for stats'. I opted to skip, and I immediately saw a pop-up that said something was messed up and that I should restart client. I did, and when I opened it it said that I left a game in progress and prompts me to reconnect. If I click to reconnect it says that it cannot connect to server and to retry or cancel. If I cancel my whole computer freezes and I have to restart. If I retry I have to keep retrying. No matter how many times I restart my computer/league it keeps happening. I have Mac OS X by the way

replies.body:
Heyo,

Could be you're stuck in a ghost game. Pretty rare, but if that's the case, nothing you can do on your end to fix it since you've already tried to reconnect and restart the client, I think you can only wait for it to finish sadly. The game should pass and finish within the next two hours (but usually is around an hour).
It's been 2 hours and league is still telling me that I'm in a game.
Same thing happened to me earlier as well, every time I try to re-log I get sent to the screen. Only thing i'm worried about is if the Win/Loss will still count?
I am having the same issue as well as another friend I have that is in the same game.  I'm using Windows by the way.
